text: Victor Frederick "Vic" Snyder (born September 27, 1947) is an American physician, lawyer, and politician. He was the U.S. representative for from 1997 to 2011. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Snyder announced on January 15, 2010 that he would retire at the end of his term. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Arkansas Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Politicians from Medford, Oregon Category:Politicians from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Lawyers from Oregon Category:American physicians Category:Military people from Oregon
title: Vic Snyder
